title: The Tern HSD cargo bike is updated for greater capacity with no less flexibilty
content:
More cargo capacity, up to 50 percent more power from its Bosch electric assist, unbeatable size that makes the new Tern HSD cargo bike deeply practical.

Read the full article at The Tern HSD cargo bike is updated for greater capacity with no less flexibilty on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
